windup:xpath-value.description: Check whether a static application.xml file is provided. It generally shouldn't, allowing it to be generated according to the POM lib config.
Override of POM Lib configuration - Drop the version element in the EAR config
Override of POM Lib configuration - Drop the addDefaultImplementationEntries config
Unexpected side-effect in mvn deploy phase. Consider removing it
The WSDL can just as well be generated at runtime, which is the preferred way. Consider removing this plugin from the build. Only in specific classloading circumstances this might bring a solution.
